Name: Biblical Sidecar
Ingredients: 15 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
Instructions: MUDDLE cloves in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Review: Cognac and freshly squeezed orange juice warmed with ginger and clove spice.
History: A Christmas cocktail created in October 2011 by yours truly at the Cabinet Room in London, England. Sidecar cocktail history and recipe variations
